duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the company’s operational accounting functions, including journal entries, month-end checklist, account reconciliations, etc.
Assess current close process and demonstrate a clear understanding of current control requirements.
Complete month-end close tasks on time, including but not limited to JE and reconciliation review.
Establish/execute contingency planning by hiring, training, and mentoring direct reports.
Review & evaluate current SOX controls in functional area.
Understand and clearly articulate flux in assigned accounts. Review and update accounting SOPs and narratives for responsible areas.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, Business (Master's preferred)
